name: Main Switchboard & Termination of Cables ITP002
template name: Main Switchboard & Termination of Cables ITP002

name: Preparation
Locate & fix switchboard into position - check for clearances fix correctly
Determine cable sizes for cable glands & mark out gland plate (check cable O.D's for cable size glands)
Install cable glands & cables
Install lugs & terminate
Clean & vacuum out board - please take a photo
Check all circuits are terminated & safe at the other end or disconnect
Final visual inspection of board - please take a photo
Installation
Test earth continuity & resistance
Test insulation resistance
Test polarity
Test phase rotation
Attach prescribed certificate of electrical safety. Organise inspection by inspector (Add photo or attached certification
Isolate / lock off/ dange tag all outgoing circuits - please take a photo
Ensure labelling is complete & accurate
Energise system
Check phase rotation
Check switchboard as installed as per drawings
Drawing & revision number(s)
Ensure any modifications to shop drawings are matched to existing & returned to office / attach drawings
Ensure switch room is left clean - please take a photo
FINAL - Pass when happy to proceed with work(s) (Any issues please comment below)
